title: Untrusted File Upload
description: Explore the dangers of unrestricted file uploads by exploiting a vulnerable file sharing service.
hints: Consider what types of files could be dangerous if allowed to execute on a server.
Look for ways to execute code server-side after uploading a file.
The flag is hidden in a location accessible by web shell operations.
learningObjectives: Understand the risks of insecure file uploads
Learn to exploit unrestricted file uploads
Practice using web shells to gather information
